EmailTemplate.name: B2B Password Reset For Provisioned User
EmailTemplate.subject: Password Reset For Fear Free Account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
An account already exists under this email address. To reset your password, click the button below:
Reset Password
If you have any issues resetting your password, please reach out to wags@fearfree.com for assistance.
For the love of animals, The Fear Free Team
This is an automated message. Please do not reply directly.
